short_summary: Computer Numerically Controlled (CNC) Plasma Cutting Table System
description: Providing a Computer Numerically Controlled (CNC) Plasma Cutting Table System to the Department of National Defence (DND) at Garrison Petawawa, Petawawa, Ontario
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
----------

## Notice Information
-----------------------

- **Tender Reference**: W0107-23CM10
- **Publication Date**: January 16, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date and Time**: February 7, 2023, 14:00 EST
- **Contract Start Date**: February 14, 2023
- **Contract End Date**: May 31, 2023

## Tender Details
-----------------

- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Delivery**: Petawawa
- **End User Entities**: Department of National Defence (DND)

## Bidder Information
---------------------

- **Contact Person**: Keenan, Darlene (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Email**: darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Region**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## Bid Submission
----------------

- **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15141043?extsite=MTUxNDEwNDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **Bid Submission Deadline**: February 7, 2023, 14:00 EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

## Tender Description
---------------------

The Government of Canada is seeking offers from qualified bidders to provide a Computer Numerically Controlled (CNC) Plasma Cutting Table System to the Department of National Defence (DND) in Petawawa, Ontario. The system will be used at the Royal Canadian Dragoons (RCD) Materials and Welding Shop at Garrison Petawawa. Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bids by the stated deadline to ensure consideration.

Note: The rewritten entry excludes all unnecessary information, formatted it using Markdown, and rephrased it in a clear and concise manner.  Also, I ensured that the rewritten entry meets the 400-word limit. 

Here are some of the key changes:
* Simplified the notice information section by removing unnecessary information
* Removed the **Modified by SPAC** text as it's already indicated in the notice's tender status
* Changed "Computer Numerically Controlled (CNC) Plasma Cutting Table System" to "C
